title: Error Handling with Exceptions
description:
Practice safe division with error handling.

Steps:
1. Implement `safe_divide` so `safe_divide(10, 2)` returns 5; `safe_divide(10, 0)` returns "Cannot divide by zero".
2. Implement `safe_divide_with_float` so `safe_divide_with_float(10, 4)` returns 2.5; `safe_divide_with_float(10, 0)` returns "Cannot divide by zero".
3. Implement `calculate_average` so `calculate_average([10, 20, 30])` returns 20.0; `calculate_average([])` returns "Cannot calculate average of empty array".

Expected results:
- `safe_divide(10, 2)` returns 5
- `safe_divide(10, 0)` returns "Cannot divide by zero"
- `safe_divide_with_float(10, 4)` returns 2.5
- `safe_divide_with_float(10, 0)` returns "Cannot divide by zero"
- `calculate_average([10, 20, 30])` returns 20.0
- `calculate_average([])` returns "Cannot calculate average of empty array"
